docs.snippet: As President Obama tries to rally domestic support for military action against Syria, the skepticism in Waynesburg, Pa.,  underscores the political hurdles he faces....
docs.lead_paragraph: As President Obama tries to rally domestic support for military action against Syria, the skepticism in Waynesburg, Pa.,  underscores the political hurdles he faces.
docs.abstract: Skepticism among residents of Waynesburg, Pa, over possible military action against Syria underscores political hurdles Pres Obama faces as he tries to rally domestic support for attack; bucolic, if fading, town is proudly patriotic, but many see Middle East as quicksand to be avoided and say that domestic needs override foreign imperatives.

headline.main: Skepticism and Wariness in Talk of Syria Attack
headline.print_headline: Proudly Patriotic but Skeptical on Syria Attack

docs.snippet: All three candidate cities to host the 2020 Summer Games — Istanbul, Tokyo and Madrid — presented risks ahead of Saturday’s vote....
docs.lead_paragraph: All three candidate cities to host the 2020 Summer Games — Istanbul, Tokyo and Madrid — presented risks ahead of Saturday’s vote.
docs.abstract: International Olympic Committee is preparing to choose host city for 2020; all three candidates, Istanbul, Madrid and Tokyo, pose risks, and it is impossible to know which will prevail in a secret ballot.

headline.main: 3 Cities in Running for 2020 Olympics Have Shortcomings
headline.print_headline: No Favorite Emerges Among Cities Vying For 2020 Olympics
